headline: Jim Cramer Notes “Every Single Retailer That’s Reported is Doing Better Than Expected” Except Burlington
summary: Burlington Stores, Inc. (NYSE:BURL) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Cramer mentioned the company while discussing the performance of retailers, as he commented: “I can tell you that credit quality actually is surprisingly good, or I could go company by company, which is really my specialty. Right now, I find that other […]
